item.description:
MIT Lunch Table
12:30pm-2:00pm every Wednesday
Building E51 (Tang Center, 70 Memorial Drive) Room 095 (meeting room in the basement)

Please bring your lunch and stop by for a nice chat!

*Please note the location is a little tricky to find.* You can enter the Tang Center (E51) on Amherst St. or on Memorial Drive. There is a smaller entrance on Amherst that is set back from the street (as opposed to the main revolving doors). If you go in those doors you can go to your right and down the stairs immediately there (there is an elevator if you turn to the left at this entrance). At the bottom of the stairs you turn to the right and go to the end of the hall. Room 095 is on the left.

You can also enter on 70 Memorial Drive as the room is on this side of the building. You can take the elevator or go to the stairs that are to the left when you enter. Again, go down to the LL (basement) level, turn to the right, and go all the way down the hall.

We hope to see you all there!
item.name: MIT Lunch Table
